features: Iconic French press coffee maker that brings out the full flavor and aroma of your brew
The carafe is made of non-stain, heat-resistant borosilicate glass that won’t alter or impair the coffee’s natural flavor
The glass is framed with durable and lightweight plastic that protects the glass and is comfortable to use
Stainless steel plunger prevents ground beans escaping when the coffee is poured
More environmentally friendly than many coffee-brewing methods – no paper filters or plastic capsules required
Easy to use and easy to clean
body.description: About the JAVA French Press Coffee Maker Beloved by coffee connoisseurs around the world, Bodum’s iconic French press brewing system offers simplicity of brewing and purity of taste. Our JAVA French press coffee maker has an iconic, retro-style design with all the modern qualities necessary to produce a rich, flavorful brew. Simple, stylish and swift, the JAVA transforms coarsely ground beans and hot water into the most reinvigorating of drinks within minutes. Its borosilicate glass carafe won’t alter or impair the flavor of your favorite coffee, while its durable plastic frame looks fantastic and characterizes the Bodum motto that ‘good design doesn’t have to be expensive’. An environmentally friendly method of brewing, the JAVA is the best French press coffee maker for ultimate simplicity and maximum taste. Main Features & Benefits

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Make taste, not waste Pure and simple No paper filter No capsules No waste Do you have 4 minutes? The French press coffee maker is the simplest of all brewing systems, where coarsely ground beans meet hot water right off the boil. The right temperature (92–96 °C, 195–205 °F) brings the optimal extraction power for the essential oils in the beans to develop their full flavor profile in just four minutes. An easy press on the plunger locks the grinds at the bottom of the glass carafe and stops the brewing process. Body, handle, & lid made of BPA free plastic Beaker is made of heat resistant borosilicate glass Filter & plunger is made of stainless steel Brews & makes delicious coffee Available in Black & White Made in Portugal

Java French Press Collection The Java coffee maker incorporates the Bodum's motto beautifully: good design doesn't have to be expensive. Just hot water and ground coffee is all that's needed. And that's all that coffee lovers are left with too, no waste, just taste.

How to brew French press coffee: Step 1 For each 4-ounce cup, put 1 rounded tablespoon or 1 Bodum scoop of coarse-ground coffee into the pot. Step 2 Pour hot (not boiling) water into the pot. Leave a minimum of 1 inch of space at the top. Stir with a plastic spoon. Step 3 Place the plunger unit on top of the pot. Turn lid to close off the pour spout opening. Do not press down. Let the coffee brew for 4 minutes. Step 4 After 4 minutes press down the plunger and enjoy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband loves it. It’s easy to use and to clean. And apparently makes great quality coffee

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought a 3 cup French press from the BODUM website, and was disappointed to learn that “3 cups” is actually the companies measuring system for the amount of coffee grounds recommended to brew the pot of coffee. My original BODUM French press also leaked coffee grounds in tho the coffee, as the seal was silicone instead of a metal like this one. I bought this in replacement, and was thoroughly pleased with the size of the pot, as it makes 2 full cups of coffee. I like strong coffee, but instead of using the recommended 8 “cups” of grounds, I use just 3, and it produces a delicious bold flavor regardless. Very good quality!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars French Coffee Press
reviews.reviewText: This is fabulous. My other one broke so I ordered this for a replacement and actually like it better than the Mr. Coffee I had before

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap plastic stand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband loved this item. Easy to clean and great to make your coffee as strong as you like. It is a great gift for anyone that lives French press coffee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love my drip coffee in the morning
reviews.reviewText: Had a metal cage carafe before. I like the plastic cage this carafe uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very cheap quality
reviews.reviewText: I've had Bodums over the years and this one is by far the cheapest quality Bodum I've ever owned. I should've sprung for the nicer version of a metal cage. When I disassembled the plunger to clean, I didn't realize the bottom cross ring didn't have the screw in mechanism attached. Thankfully it fell in my sink but at the time I didn't know that. When you're cleaning the the main beaker, the holder is cheap plastic and just falls right over. It's a French press and it works just fine. But, the quality of the French press itself is super cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ugh, my French press fell out of the hutch while I was working. Saw this brand name on my tiny single cup press. Great price. And, the glass fits in my previous holder that’s steel. So, I can move it if I prefer the chrome steel look.So far works like my original press.⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️💯

Esta prensa francesa es muy útil, los materiales son de buena calidad. Sólo se me dificulta un poco para terminar de secar el vaso por fuera, no puede quitarlo de la base, siento que si lo forzo mucho para safarlo, se me puede resbalar y romper. Pero lo soluciono secando lo más que se puede con una servilleta y listo. Para lavar el filtro es muy fácil, y se puede desarmar quitando el tornillo, se vuelve a armar rápido, y viene con un diagrama visual para ensamblarlo en el orden que debe ser. Venía bien empaquetado cuando lo recibí.
There is no substitute for a French Press
Demora um pouco pra se adaptar e conseguir encontrar as medidas certas pra fazer o café do jeito que você gosta, e de manter o café quente enquanto se espera o tempo de infusão. Mas o produto é bom!
